ygData.subject: Re: Marnek Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks YY in adv... kekekekeke... if i get anything monk need... i will pass it to ya... :))) oh yea... someone mentioned bout setting up a web site fer
ygData.messageBody:
thanks YY in adv... kekekekeke... if i get anything monk need... i will pass
it to ya... :)))

oh yea... someone mentioned bout setting up a web site fer sg-eq... wheres
that? also... maybe we can put up some sort of trading or selling site fer
locals... n also... give aways n stuff....

Nic

Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Marnek Dagger


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> I'm not trained in dagger, and so far never get any weap from the other
> guys. I bought my own RTS at 20pp. I think u can get woven at guk, but
> I'm not sure if it's worth doing so. The place is damn dangerous even for
> lvl 20, and woven armor is only 1 ac more than cloth + magical armor. I
> dunno why it cost so much for that extra ac and dunno what can tat 'magic'
> do.
>
> If anyone selling or know anyone selling FBR, pls let me know, looking for
> it badly.
>
> Zil

it
> fer awhile... but can be pretty boring brewing.... ok... just a few quick
